description: Targus Slim Case for iPad® 3Slim CaseThin, Light, and Fully FunctionalPart of a slim and elegant line of iPad cases, the Slim Case is the light and functional solution for iPad users who travel light. Designed to complement the iPad without compromising on size, the Slim Case is form-fitting to the iPad. The molded back cover also provides a sturdy, hard-sided protection for the iPad. Add more protection, less bulk and save space when you travel for business or pleasure.Multiple Viewing AnglesYou don’t have to strain to watch a video or type when you’re on the go. With two viewing angles for watching videos and typing, the case easily converts from case to stand. Go from surfing the web in landscape mode to reading the daily news in portrait without any hassle with this thin and simple case.Two viewing angles forwatching videos and typingEasily converts fromcase to standThin and simple casePrecision-Cut Camera OpeningThey say a picture is worth a thousand words, but are you tired of having to take your iPad out of the case when taking a picture? The Slim Case has a precision-cut camera hole that prevents shadowing when taking pictures with your iPad for clear, unobstructed images. So capture pictures that last a lifetime with ease.Precision-cut camera openingTake pictures with your iPadin the caseTakes clear, unobstructedimagesLittle DetailsWith detailed accent stitching, an easy-to-clean twill exterior, and a soft-lined interior, the Slim Case boasts premium materials that are functional and attractive. The Slim Case was built with a custom fit cradle to keep your iPad nice and snug while in use and in transit. In addition to shielding your iPad from scratches and dust, this case also features clever stylus storage without adding any bulk while the magnetic on/off feature helps conserve battery life by putting your iPad to sleep while the case is closed – there’s no need to press any buttons!Easy-to-clean exterior materialSoft-to-the-touch interior liningCustom fit cradle.GreyNote { font-family : Helvetica;
